WRITING.TEXT: A drunk Aussie redneck with a mullet would be a nice touch.

WRITING.TITLE: Stop time and time control feature?
WRITING.TEXT:
Wouldn't it be cool for TABS to have a freeze time button? Easier to catch cool action filled screenshots in a massive battle when there are cannonballs in mid air clashing into one another above a front row of shields trying to hold against footmens. Or even a ~~slow motion and and~~ fast forward function. Or a replay mode? Just throwing ideas out...
[EDIT] Just found out about the slow motion. Other ideas tho...
Please tell me what you are using for those icons
Throwing the G word around so carelessly? That's racist...
